[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
[[=]]
**The World Wide Web**
Trip into my parlour.

**[[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/this-page-intentionally-left-blank|More by this author!]]]**
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[=]]
+ The World Wide Web
[[/=]]

[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-b-b-decommission/Asterisk43.png]]
@@ @@

+ ##990011|2007##
++ 8 September
[[span style="font-family: BauhausLTDemi; font-size: 120%;"]]**[http://www.scpwiki.com/secure-facility-dossier-site-43 Site-43]: Lambton County, Ontario, Canada**[[/span]]
[[/=]]

----

William Wettle took a deep breath.

He checked his watch. 6:24 PM. He checked the clock over the Replication Studies lab door. 6:24 PM. He checked his other watch -- it paid to be thorough, when it came to his luck -- and at the moment he checked, the minute ticked over.

6:25. Showtime.

He darted to the door.

He tripped.

[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-b-b-decommission/Asterisk43.png]]
@@ @@

+ ##990011|2008##
++ 9 September
[[/=]]

----

[[div class="Ngo"]]
**Debriefing Log 5243-B**

**Subjects:** Harold R. Blank (Chair, Archives and Revision Section, Site-43); Delfina M. Ibanez (Chief, Security and Containment Section, Site-43); Lillian S. Lillihammer (Chair, Memetics and Countermemetics Section, Site-43); Allan J. McInnis (Director, Site-43); Noè Nascimbeni (Chief, Janitorial and Maintenance Section, Site-43); Udo A. Okorie (Researcher, Applied Occultism Section, Site-43); William W. Wettle (Deputy Chair, Replication Studies Subsection, Site-43)

**Officer of Record:** Nhung T. Ngo (Senior Researcher, Psychology and Parapsychology Section, Site-43) 

**SCP Deviations:** Dr. Wettle tripped before reaching the hallway and did not collide with the S&C agents. They were subsequently able to flush AAF-D and escape before the airlock was sealed.

----

//Drs. Blank, Lillihammer, McInnis and Okorie appear extremely preoccupied. Chief Ibanez has a fierce and haunted expression. Chief Nascimbeni will not make eye contact. Dr. Wettle is hugging himself and scratching his arms compulsively.//
 
**Dr. Ngo:** Are you alright? You all seem... agitated.

**Dr. Blank:** Spiders.

**Dr. Ngo:** Spiders?

**Dr. Lillihammer:** Spiders.

**Chief Ibanez:** //Fucking// spiders.

**Dr. Ngo:** Can you expand on that?

**Dr. Blank:** No.

**Dr. Okorie:** No.

**Chief Ibanez:** Fuck. No.

**Dr. McInnis:** I'll... make a report. In private.

----

**Addendum:** Dr. Wettle and Chief Nascimbeni refused to speak at all. Dr. McInnis filed his report with O5 Command; it is classified Level 5: Top Secret. All seven individuals were treated for multiple █████ █████ over 75% of their █████████ ████.
[[/div]]
